chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: soup
V: is_true (valid s)
s': PCM.sort (union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)))
id: Ordered.sort mid
m: msg TaggedMessage

Goal:
valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)

Premises:
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
Notation PCM T m := (PCM T m)
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
mark_msg : forall T : Type, msg T -> msg T
Notation valid := valid
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (EqType T (
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
union_map_classPCM : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> pcm
allP : reflect {in ?s, forall x : ?T, ?a x} (all ?a ?s) where ?T : [s : soup V : valid s s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) id : mid m : msg TaggedMessage |- eqType] ?a : [s : soup V : valid s s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) id : mid m : msg TaggedMessage |- pred ?T] ?s : [s : soup V : valid s s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) id : mid m : msg TaggedMessage |- seq ?T]
is_active = fun id : mid => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : mid -> Prop
is_consumed = fun id : mid => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : mid -> Prop
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [s : soup V : valid s s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) id : mid m : msg TaggedMessage |- Type]
heap_eta2 = fun (A : Type) (x : ptr) (h : heap) (v : A) (E : find x h = Some (axioms.dyn id v)) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (x0 : Type) (p : (fun A0 : Type => exists v0 : A0, find x h = Some (axioms.dyn id v0) /\ h = x :-> v0 \+ free x h) x0), (fun=> h = x :-> v \+ free x h) (ex_intro (fun A0 : Type => exists v0 : A0, find x h = Some (axioms.dyn id v0) /\ h = x :-> v0 \+ free x h) x0 p) => match heap_eta (find_some E) as e return ((fun=> h = x :-> v \+ free x h) e) with | @ex_intro _ _ x0...
post_msg = fun m : msg TaggedMessage => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
soup = union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) : Type
umpleq_some : forall (K : ordType) (A : Type) (U : union_map_class K A) (x1 x2 : U) (t : K) (s : A), valid x2 -> [pcm x1 <= x2] -> find t x1 = Some s -> find t x2 = Some s
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments last {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
find_some = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v0 : V) (e : find k f = Some v0) (e0 : f = upd k v0 (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @...
lookPtUnO : forall (A : Type) (h : heap) (x : ptr) (v : A) (f : partition (x :-> v) h), valid f -> find x f = Some (axioms.dyn ssrfun.id v)
um_eta2 = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U) (E : find k f = Some v) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (x : V) (p : (fun v0 : V => find k f = Some v0 /\ f = pts k v0 \+ free k f) x), (fun=> f = pts k v \+ free k f) (ex_intro (fun v0 : V => find k f = Some v0 /\ f = pts k v0 \+ free k f) x p) => match um_eta (find_some E) as e return ((fun=> f = pts k v \+ free k f) e) with | @ex_intro _ _ x x0 => _evar_0_ x x0 end) (fun (v' : V) (__top_assumption_...
ins = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (k : K) (v : V) '(@FinMap _ _ s' p') => FinMap (sorted_ins' k v p') : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), K -> V -> finMap K V -> finMap K V Arguments ins {K} {V}%type_scope
find_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall k : K, find k f1 = find k f2) -> f1 = f2
findPt_inv = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v w : V) => (fun _evar_0_ : find k1 (upd k2 v Unit) = Some w -> [/\ k1 = k2, v = w & cond U k2] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : U => find k1 _pattern_value_ = Some w -> [/\ k1 = k2, v = w & cond U k2]) _evar_0_ (ptsU U k2 v)) ((fun _evar_0_ : (if k1 == k2 then if cond U k2 && valid Unit then Some v else None else if cond U k2 then find k1 Unit else None) = Some w -> [/\ k1 = k2, v = w & cond U k2] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern...
findUnPt2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (f \+ pts k2 v) -> find k1 (f \+ pts k2 v) = (if k1 == k2 then Some v else find k1 f)
findPtUn2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k2 v \+ f) -> find k1 (pts k2 v \+ f) = (if k1 == k2 then Some v else find k1 f)
find_none = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v : V) (e : find k f = Some v) (e0 : f = upd k v (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @dom_find_some' _ _ _ _...
findPtUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \+ f) -> find k (pts k v \+ f) = Some v
findUnPt : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (f \+ pts k v) -> find k (f \+ pts k v) = Some v
umpleq_none : forall (K : ordType) (A : Type) (U : union_map_class K A) (x1 x2 : U) (t : K), valid x2 -> [pcm x1 <= x2] -> find t x2 = None -> find t x1 = None
dom_find_some' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) (v : V), find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true
heap_eta : forall (x : ptr) (h : heap), x \in dom h -> exists (A : Type) (v : A), find x h = Some (axioms.dyn ssrfun.id v) /\ h = x : -> v \+ free x h
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
PCM.sort = fun t : pcm => let (sort, _) := t in sort : pcm -> Type PCM.sort is a coercion
Variant dom_find_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) : bool -> Type := dom_find_none' : find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false | dom_find_some' : forall v : V, find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true Arguments dom_find_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments dom_find_none' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f] Arguments dom_find_some' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f v]
um_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> exists v : V, find k f = Some v /\ f = pts k v \+ free k f
findUnR : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> find k (f1 \+ f2) = (if k \in dom f2 then find k f2 else find k f1)
